original_title: 燕赤霞传之情迷兰若寺
overview: As the son of the famous exorcist Yan Hongxia, Yan Chixia, who scorns and sells magical weapons all day long, has not inherited the powerful strength of her father, nor the consciousness of saving the world, but it is strange that trouble will always find him.
title: Story of Yan Chixia: Love in Lan Ruo Temple
